931:3: śrīmadabhayapranuraktajanaṃ sa vihāya niścitamanā vanaṃ yayau||1||
931:5: prekṣya sa viṣayatṛṣākṛpaṇānanavasthitaṃ tapa iti nyavartata||2||
931:8: sa vicārayan jagati kiṃ nu paramamiti taṃ tamāgamam|
931:9: niścayamanadhigataḥ parataḥ paramaṃ cacāra tapa eva duṣkaram||4||
931:10: atha naiṣa mārga iti vīkṣya tadapi vipulaṃ jahau tapaḥ|
931:17: harṣatulamagaman muditā vimukhī tu mārapariṣat pracukṣubhe||8||
931:18: sanagā ca bhūḥ pravicacāla hutabahasakhaḥ śivo vavau|
931:19: nedurapi ca suradundubhayaḥ pravavarṣa cāmbudharavarjitaṃ nabhaḥ||9||
931:30: sa vinīya kāśiṣu gayeṣu bahujanamatho girivraje|
931:35: vastumatiśuci śivopavanaṃ sa dadarśa niḥspṛhatayā yathā vanam||17||
931:38: pratipūjayā na sa jaharṣa na ca śucamavajñayāgamat|
931:43: śeṣamapi ca janamaśrumukhaṃ vininīṣayā gaganamutpapāta ha||21||
931:44: sa vicakrame divi bhuvīva punarupaviveśa tasthivān|
931:46: salile kṣitāviva cacāra jalamiva viveśa medinīm|
931:47: megha iva divi vavarṣa punaḥ punarajvalannava ivodito raviḥ||23||
931:49: taptakanakasadṛśaprabhayā sa babhau pradīpta iva sandhyayā ghanaḥ||24||
931:53: paurajanamapi ca tatpravaṇaṃ nijagāda dharmavinayaṃ vināyakaḥ||26||
931:55: dharmamatulamadhigamya munermuṃnaye nanāma sa yato gurāviva||27||
931:61: kiṃ bata vipulaguṇaḥ kulajaḥ sadayaḥ sadā kimu munerupāsayā||30||
931:65: naiva ca parayuvatīragamat paramaṃ hi tā dahanato'pyamanyata||32||
931:66: anṛtaṃ jagāda na ca kaścidṛtamapi jajalpa nāpriyam|
931:67: ślakṣṇamapi ca na jagāvahitaṃ hitamapyuvāca na ca paiśunāca yat||33||
931:68: manasā lulobha na ca jātu paravasuṣu gṛddhamānasaḥ|
931:69: kāmasukhamasukhato vimṛśan vijahāra tṛpta iva tatra sajjanaḥ||34||
931:70: na parasya kaścidapaghātamapi ca saghṛṇo vyacintayat|
931:71: mātṛpitṛsutasuhṛtsadṛśaṃ sa dadarśa tatra hi parasparaṃ janaḥ||35||
931:72: niyataṃ bhaviṣyati paratra bhavadapi ca bhūtamapyatho|
931:73: karmaphalamapi ca lokagatirniyateti darśanamavāpa sādhu ca||36||
931:75: bhraṃśini śithilaguṇo'pi yuge vijahāra tatra munisaṃśrayājjanaḥ||37||
931:77: sarvamaśivamavagamya bhavaṃ bhavasaṃkṣayāya vavṛte na janmane||38||
931:79: strotasi hi vavṛtire bahavo rajasaṃstanutvamapi cakrire pare||39||
931:81: tyāgāvinayaniyamābhirato vijahāra so'pi na cacāla satpathāt||40||
931:82: api ca svato'pi parato'pi na bhayamabhavanna daivataḥ|
931:83: tatra ca susukhasubhikṣaguṇairjahṛṣuḥ prajāḥ kṛtayuge manoriva||41||
931:84: iti muditamanāmayaṃ nirāpat kururaghupūrupuropamaṃ puraṃ tat|
931:85: abhavadabhayadaiśike maharṣau viharati tatra śivāya vītarāge||42||
931:86: saundaranande mahākāvye 'tathāgata-varṇana' nāma tṛtīya sarga samāpta|
